text: This is a very close personal friend of mine who has become in tune within his soul and ascensions. Which I have been doing for about 20 years. Roughly my late teens and early twenties.

author: Bearmayhem
text: This what I meant by what I am talking about growing and changing and becoming a better me. Letting go of old ways that don’t serve my happiness my peace my fulfillment my joy. It’s time. The only thing I am keeping is the love that I give, the caring, the nurturing.

author: Bearmayhem
text: I’m ready to let the old me die. Peacefully and lovingly and respectfully and nurturing. To do this I have grieved a lot and I mean a lot of the pain of my past. But I am no longer carry that weight anymore. https://t.co/ufeoGzoMfM
